AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling scion
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the child of a halfling leader. [PAWN_pronoun] developed seeing and experiencing leadership from the sidelines.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling student
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] studied books and knowledge obsessively as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] spent so much time away from people researching, however, that [PAWN_pronoun] was well known to shy away from conflict.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling mischief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood being a terror to [PAWN_possessive] neighbors. From years of running away from responsibilities, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to be exceedingly fast, how to dodge incoming attacks, and how to escape from most of his potential captors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling mediator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was well known for being a kind and thoughtful child. However, [PAWN_pronoun] spent much time in social situations working to bring harmony amongst others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling incendiary
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an angry child. [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to start fights and anger others.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling dull child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] wanted to only play as a child. [PAWN_pronoun] never looked at pushing themselves further, but [PAWN_possessive] was lucky enough to be cute enough to slide through.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling light hand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_pronoun] had a very loose on the idea of ownership. Always in trouble [PAWN_possessive] always had their hand somewhere in appropriate.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling graceless
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a very clumsy child. Many mishaps, accidents and peices of ill luck affliced [PAWN_possessive] childhood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling inelegant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always seemed to put their foot in their mouth. [PAWN_pronoun] had few friends and rarely for long.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling street rat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on the streets, scavenging food and fighting for survival. .

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling farm-hand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of famers and grew up working to keep the land worked.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling villager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a small village, assisting where needed.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling aide
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped the fieldwardens, keeping them supplied and able to patrol. In return they picked up various tips and aid.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling gofer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as an assistant helping various trades people around the village.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling kitchen porter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up the low level help around the kitchen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling sheperd
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of farmers and often spent their early days helping guide the flocks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling messenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always on the move and soon became the one called to pass on messages and small packages.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling initiate
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] assisted at the shrines and libraries of their home town.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling urchin
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up without parental supervision, running wild they feel in with the less law abiding members of the Moot.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling glutton
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child of wealth and pampering. With little to do they turned to food.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of those rare halflings that leaves their home in search of fame and fortune.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling burglar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Halflings are often acccused of burglary by other races. Sometimes with good reason, [PAWN_nameDef] denies being part of that reason.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling drunk
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Halfings tend to enjoy a good drink and smoke. Sometimes too much that it dominates their lifestyle.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Halflings cannot stand for long without good food and often their best chefs are in demand from around the world. [PAWN_nameDef] seeks be be one of them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling layabout
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] takes the easy life of most halflings for granted and is not easily rousted to works, but is of good cheer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the many halflings who farms the foods for the cooks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling gardener
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Some halflings do not focus on a whole farm, but instead making a smaller area of plants just right.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling sweep
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Halfling sweeps maintain their settlements, rushing around keeping things together. [PAWN_nameDef] is of simple honest means.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of those who keeps the flocks protected and brings in meats for the demanding cooks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a halfling that creates wonders around them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling servant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: One with a simple occupation, they are used to keeping order in a household and keep order promoted.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling burgher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a halfling of the upper class, trained to be of phlegmatic command.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a sturdy halfling who has the skills to craft a settlement.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling fieldwarden
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The halfling fieldwardens are those who range the borders of halfling lands, [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the rare halflings who perform this service.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling militia
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Unlike ranging fieldwardens, the militia police and defend their towns.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling barber surgeon
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a traveling halfling who looks after various others from shaves and haircuts to stitching up cuts and wounds.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling rat catcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Rat catcher is a general term for those who keep the dangerous animals and vermin clear of settlements. They most often use small, but vicious dogs, to help that task.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling sewer jack
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A simple halfling that maintains the infrastructure of settlments.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling crafter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is trained in a craft to bring forth items for the aid of their settlement.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling peasant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: A simple occupation of hard labour and simple skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Halfling negotiator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is someone who greases the wheels of social interaction. Halflings tend to come off worse with violence so they try to find agreeable solutions.
